body_html: Is there any feedback on this issue? The above code segfaults on both the CPU and GPU pip binaries. I think this is fairly serious since the Shard function is the recommended method for achieving parallelism in CPU operators.
body_text: Is there any feedback on this issue? The above code segfaults on both the CPU and GPU pip binaries. I think this is fairly serious since the Shard function is the recommended method for achieving parallelism in CPU operators.
body: Is there any feedback on this issue? The above code segfaults on both the CPU and GPU pip binaries. I think this is fairly serious since the Shard function is the [recommended](https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/adding_an_op#multi-threaded_cpu_kernels) method for achieving parallelism in CPU operators.
